page.title: 14Religion in Bentley
page.content: Like Capel the Parish Church is dedicated to St Mary.The vicar is Canon E Briggs-Armson who also looks after Tattingstone. There used to be a Tabernacle made from corrugated iron in the village which was nicknamed the "Tin Tab" but it was rebuilt in brick a year ago when somebody left money in their will. Mrs.Cranmer runs a {pathfinders}group. It starts at 6.00 on Fridays.They have stories about Jesus and God and prayers and games.At the end there are questions and the children can win sweets. {Youth Club}starts at 7.15 and costs 30p.You can play table tennis or snooker and buy sweets drinks and crisps.At 8.45 you go in a room to talk about God and drink coffee
